quickStart.title: Buying on Little Biggy: a step-by-step guide
quickStart.subtitle: Want to buy cannabis online in the UK? Here's how to get started.

exchange.def: A website or app where you can buy and sell digital currencies using regular money.

privateWallet.def: An app you control that stores your Bitcoin without relying on a bank or exchange.

escrow.def: A neutral service that holds funds and only releases them when both sides are happy.

1.title: Get Some Bitcoin
1.summary: Grab some Bitcoin so you're ready to check out.
1.p1: Little Biggy only accepts Bitcoin. You'll need to set up a way to buy some if you haven't already, so that you're ready to start ordering items.
1.easiestDesc: Apps you may already use, such as Revolut or Monzo, let you purchase Bitcoin inside the banking app in a few taps.
1.otherDescAfter: such as Coinbase or Kraken works just as well. They operate a bit like an online currency bureau.
1.proTipDesc: Buy a few pounds more than you need and round up. That extra buffer covers network fees or crypto volatility.

2.title: Find Your Items
2.summary: Browse the Little Biggy catalogue like you would on eBay
2.p1: Find items you want to buy ‚Äî on Little Biggy itself or via the index. There's a huge selection, so have a good browse.
bullets: Click the Browse Items button below to start browsing.
Check product descriptions and reviews to spot trusted sellers. If unsure, Google the seller's name or look on <reddit>Reddit</reddit>.
When ready, add what you want to your cart and enter your delivery details just like any other online store.
2.bullets0: Click the Browse Items button below to start browsing.
2.bullets1: Check product descriptions and reviews to spot trusted sellers. If unsure, Google the seller's name or look on <reddit>Reddit</reddit>.
2.bullets2: When ready, add what you want to your cart and enter your delivery details just like any other online store.
2.proTipDesc: Use filters and reviews to shortlist sellers; check their manifest for posting times.

3.title: Checkout & Send Your Bitcoin
3.summary: Copy the details, then send the payment from your phone or laptop.
3.pIntro: At checkout, Little Biggy shows a private order page with everything you need to pay safely ‚Äî whether you're on one device or switching between phone and desktop.
copyBullets: The exact BTC amount: it looks like 0.00123456. Copy it exactly so you do not underpay.
The Bitcoin address: a long string such as bc1q...‚Äîthink of it as the account number for this order.
sendSteps: Open the app or exchange you used to buy Bitcoin (Revolut, Coinbase, Monzo, Kraken, etc.).
Choose the option to send or withdraw Bitcoin.
Paste the Bitcoin address into the recipient field and the exact BTC amount into the amount field.
Confirm the transfer‚Äînetwork confirmations usually land within a few minutes and your order page will update automatically.
3.privacy1: You can move the coins to your own
3.privacy3: , and similar apps‚Äîthen forward the exact amount to Little Biggy. That extra hop keeps exchanges from seeing where you spend your Bitcoin.

4.title: Your Funds Are Safe (Escrow)
4.summary: Transaxe holds the money until your order arrives.
4.p1_before: You are not paying the seller directly. Instead, your Bitcoin lands with Transaxe, a trusted third party that provides
4.p2: Transaxe only releases the funds once the dispute window closes. If something feels off, contact the seller first ‚Äî otherwise raise a dispute from your order page.
ol: Choose the option to send or withdraw Bitcoin.
Paste the Bitcoin address into the recipient field and the exact BTC amount into the amount field.
Confirm the transfer‚Äînetwork confirmations usually land within a few minutes and your order page will update automatically.
4.cardDesc: Escrow means the seller never touches your funds until the item is shipped and received. It is the safeguard that keeps Little Biggy honest.

5.title: Wait for the Postie
5.summary: Relax while it makes its way to you.
5.p1: Sellers usually mark orders as shipped within one business day ‚Äî check their manifesto for posting times. After that it's a waiting game just like any other delivery.
5.p2: If the parcel takes longer than expected, contact the seller first‚Äîthey may provide a tracking code. As a last resort, you can open a dispute from your order page while Escrow is still holding the funds.

faq.label: Frequently asked
faq.title: FAQs for first-time visitors
faq.subtitle: Two quick panels: one about how Biggy Index works, another covering Little Biggy payments and crypto basics.

about.a: The Biggy Index provides an easier way to browse the Little Biggy marketplace, with item categorisation, additional sorting options, and other handy tools tailored for UK shoppers.

about.q: Do you sell or ship items?
about.a: No. Biggy Index is read-only and sends you back to Little Biggy to complete your order.

about.q: Where does the data come from?
about.a: The index fetches public Little Biggy data, normalising categories, pricing summaries, shipping info, reviews and images.

There are 3 components that refresh at different intervals. The main indexer runs every 15 minutes. The item and seller crawlers run every 4 hours, at separate times to be mindful of Little Biggy's server.

about.q: What does First Seen or Updated on items mean?
about.a: First seen/created means that it's the first time the item was indexed by the crawler. This can include items which were on LB before the indexer existed. Updated means that the item was edited by the seller, or that the crawler detected a change (e.g. price, variants, description).
Community votes that highlight popular items without tracking you.

crypto.q: What payments does Little Biggy accept?
crypto.a: Only Bitcoin - no cards, bank transfers or other cryptocurrencies.

crypto.q: How do I buy Bitcoin in the UK?
crypto.a: Most buyers use Revolut, Monzo, Kraken, or Coinbase. Top up in pounds, purchase the amount of BTC shown at checkout, and allow a few pounds for network or exchanging fees.

crypto.q: Do I need my own wallet first?
crypto.a: You can pay straight from the exchange, but many people move BTC into a private wallet like Cake Wallet or Trust Wallet for extra privacy. UK exchanges are required to ask where you're sending coins ‚Äî so some buyers prefer routing via a personal wallet.

crypto.q: How does Transaxe escrow protect me?
crypto.a: Your payment goes to a Transaxe escrow address. Sellers have about 80 hours to mark orders as shipped or the funds auto-refund. Disputes open after nine days if needed.
Copy-paste the BTC amount and address, add a buffer for fees, and keep screenshots until your parcel arrives. The blockchain cannot undo typos.

crypto.q: Why not just use clearnet shops?
crypto.a: Competition on Little Biggy keeps quality high and prices fair. Clearnet resellers often charge heavy markups or ship questionable stock.
Cannabis laws still apply. You are responsible for staying within local regulations and verifying every detail on Little Biggy.

highlights.description: Search Little Biggy's public listings with filters built for the UK. Avoid heavy markups or scams associated with clearnet sources.
